description: A comprehensive SoC-based portfolio showcasing multi-domain technical expertise across Full-Stack Development, Cloud Engineering, Data Analytics, UX/UI Design, and Technical Consulting. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and modern web technologies with $30M+ demonstrated business impact.
rules: Follow Separation of Concerns (SoC) architecture principles
Use TypeScript strict mode for all components
Optimize for performance with sub-10kB page sizes
Use Next.js 15 App Router with static export
Follow atomic design principles for components
Implement proper error boundaries and loading states
Use Tailwind CSS with custom design system
Maintain professional quality and business impact focus
